shortdesc.ph: Used to obtain statistics of a specific network path in multipath transmission.

section.p: Represents the statistics of a specific path in multipath transmission.

plentry.pd: The path type, such as LAN, Wi-Fi, or mobile network.
The type of the path. See .
The transmission bitrate of the path in Kbps.
The receiving bitrate of the path in Kbps.
